strings.Value: "We must set patrols. Preferably in groups of two."
"Bad place for a camp. We'd best not linger here long."
"Cool it, tough guy. If anyone attacks, we'll calm 'em down in a heartbeat."
"I'd better chance my luck and go to sleep. I don't want blue rings around my eyes tomorrow!"
"The closer we get to the danger, the sooner we'll put an end to it. We just have to stay on guard. â€” Wise caution is not contrary to valor."
"Thank you, but I don't plan to spend all night outside."
"I will do like this. I hide and wait until you are attacked. Then I run away."
